skills.title: JavaScript
skills.description: Proficiency in ES6+ features-Understanding of asynchronous programming-DOM manipulation and event handling-Error handling and debugging

skills.title: html / css
skills.description: Semantic HTML5 structure-CSS Flexbox and Grid for responsive design-CSS-in-JS libraries (styled-components, emotion)-Mobile-first design and media queries

skills.title: React
skills.description: Component-based architecture (functional & class components)-State management (useState, useReducer)-Hooks (useEffect, useContext, custom hooks)-Props handling and component communication-React Router for client-side routing-Redux or Context API for global state management

skills.title: Express.js and Node.js
skills.description: Building RESTful APIs-Middleware creation and management-Authentication and authorization (JWT, OAuth)-Handling file uploads and downloads-Error handling and validation-WebSockets for real-time communication-Using templating engines like EJS, Handlebars

skills.title: MongoDB and Mongoose
skills.description: Understanding of NoSQL databases and document-based data modeling-CRUD operations with Mongoose-Schema design and validation-Aggregation pipelines and advanced queries-Indexing and optimization for performance-Database security (access control, user roles)

skills.title: General Development Skills
skills.description: Version control with Git and GitHub/GitLab-Debugging and testing (Jest, Mocha, Chai)-Familiarity with APIs and third-party services (REST, GraphQL)-Deployment (Heroku, Netlify, Vercel, or Docker)-Code optimization and best practices for performance-CI/CD pipelines and automation tools (GitHub Actions, Jenkins)
